attributes.action: MAKE THE WORSHIPPING AND UP-KEEP OF CAL-LOOK VOLKSWAGEN BEETLES A RECOGNISED RELIGION
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i , like many other religiously polish my car every sunday , and as such , it shoiuld be recognised as a religion that can be used on official documents etc.
NOSE-DOWN !!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
